title:
Derived Equivalences of Generalized Grassmannian Flops: $D_4$ and
  $G_2^{\dagger}$ Cases
abstract:
We prove that the generalized Grassmannian flops of both $D_4$ and
$G_2^{\dagger}$ type induce derived equivalences, which provide new evidence
for the DK conjecture by Bondal-Orlov and Kawamta. The proof is based on
Kuznetsov's mutation technique, which takes a sequence of mutations of
exceptional objects.
